title: Snow Baby
description: It happened one snowy night...When Chantel Miller gets lost during an unexpected snowstorm, a stranger named Dillon Broderick rescues her. In the hours they spend together they become very close and the intimacy of that night creates a special bond between them.But real life intervenes. The woman Chantel was on her way to see is her sister, Stacy. They've been estranged for 10 years and Chantel is determined to regain her affection. The woman Dillon was on his way to see is...Stacy. They've been friends for some time but now there's an added complication. Stacy's in love with him. Which means Chantel can't pursue a relationship with Dillon. Even when she discovers she's pregnant because of that snowy night...
author: Brenda Novak
